price: Burya, umuntu ntiyigera arambirwa no gusaba Imana Allah ivyiza vyo kw’isi[6]; iyo akozweko n’ikiza c’ubukene canke indwara n'ibindi, aca yihebura akiyumvira nabi Imana Allah;
arabic: لَّا يَسۡـَٔمُ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ مِن دُعَآءِ ٱلۡخَيۡرِ وَإِن مَّسَّهُ ٱلشَّرُّ فَيَـُٔوسٞ قَنُوطٞ
footnotes: [6] Ivyiza bivugwa ng’aha, ni amatungo, amagara meza, ubutegetsi n’ibindi.

meta.transliteration: lā yasamu al-insānu min duʿāi al-khayri wa-in massahu al-sharu fayaūsun qanūṭun
